## ignite vm start

Start a VM

### Synopsis

Start a VM

```
ignite vm start [vm] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --debug           Debug mode, keep container after VM shutdown
  -h, --help            help for start
  -i, --interactive     Attach to the VM after starting
  -p, --ports strings   Map host ports to VM ports
```
